name: create-mithrilts-app
description: Create a mithril app, using TypeScript and Materialize-CSS.

scripts.patch: npm version patch --force -m "Patch release" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor: npm version minor --force -m "Minor release" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major: npm version major --force -m "Major release" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Erik Vullings <erik.vullings@gmail.com>
